title: Gell's Gravitas
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| [![Gell's gravitas.png](/images/a/a9/Gell%27s_gravitas.png)](/File:Gell%27s_gravitas.png) Gell's Gravitas |                                                                                                                                        |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                                     | 4                                                                                                                                      |
| School1                                                                                                   | [Translocation](/Translocations "Translocations")                                                                                      |
| Source(s)                                                                                                 | [Book of Displacement](/Book_of_Displacement "Book of Displacement") [There-And-Back Book](/There-And-Back_Book "There-And-Back Book") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                               | 3                                                                                                                                      |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                 | 0                                                                                                                                      |
| Power Cap                                                                                                 | 100                                                                                                                                    |
| Range                                                                                                     | LOS                                                                                                                                    |
| Flags                                                                                                     | Needs tracer, Not self, Target                                                                                                         |

**Gell's Gravitas** was a level 3 [Translocation](/Translocations "Translocations") spell that pulled nearby creatures toward the target, causing damage if they collided. This effect could move monsters through ineligible terrain (like [lava](/Lava "Lava")), but not into it. It did not affect the caster.

[Warpers](/Warper "Warper") started with this spell available.

## Strategy

- Gell's Gravitas can do a surprising amount of damage if used in large clusters of enemies, particularly large-sized monsters. Use it on fragile spellcasters out of your direct line of sight to deal with them quickly.
- Gell's Gravitas can be used to clump multiple enemies into one location, making it an ideal setup for area-of-effect spells such as [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), [Inner Flame](/Inner_Flame "Inner Flame"), and [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud").
- Be careful when using this spell around friendly targets. [Summons](/Summon "Summon") will vanish, and other allies, like [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")'s undead, will turn hostile.

## History

- Removed in [0.32](/0.32 "0.32") and replaced with the [evocable](/Evocable "Evocable") [Gell's gravitambourine](/Gell%27s_gravitambourine "Gell's gravitambourine") with a much larger and stronger effect.
- In [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), this spell was moved to [Warper](/Warper "Warper"), from [Arcane Marksman](/Arcane_Marksman "Arcane Marksman")'s book.
- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), this spell was moved to the [Book of the Warp](/Book_of_the_Warp "Book of the Warp").
- In [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), Gell's Gravitas became part of the [Book of Hinderance](/Book_of_Hinderance "Book of Hinderance") and the [Book of Debilitation](/Book_of_Debilitation "Book of Debilitation"), set to level 3 and smite-targeted, but no longer confusing enemies.
- Gell's Gravitas was added in [0.16](/0.16 "0.16").

Gell's Gravitas

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
 Gell's Gravitas
Level 4
School1 Translocation
Source(s)

Book of Displacement
There-And-Back Book

Casting noise 3
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 100
Range LOS
Flags Needs tracer, Not self, Target

Gell's Gravitas was a level 3 Translocation spell that pulled nearby creatures toward the target, causing damage if they collided. This effect could move monsters through ineligible terrain (like lava), but not into it. It did not affect the caster.

Warpers started with this spell available.

Strategy

  • Gell's Gravitas can do a surprising amount of damage if used in large clusters of enemies, particularly large-sized monsters. Use it on fragile spellcasters out of your direct line of sight to deal with them quickly.
  • Gell's Gravitas can be used to clump multiple enemies into one location, making it an ideal setup for area-of-effect spells such as Fireball, Inner Flame, and Freezing Cloud.
  • Be careful when using this spell around friendly targets. Summons will vanish, and other allies, like Necromancy's undead, will turn hostile.

History

  • Removed in 0.32 and replaced with the evocable Gell's gravitambourine with a much larger and stronger effect.
  • In 0.20, this spell was moved to Warper, from Arcane Marksman's book.
  • In 0.19, this spell was moved to the Book of the Warp.
  • In 0.17, Gell's Gravitas became part of the Book of Hinderance and the Book of Debilitation, set to level 3 and smite-targeted, but no longer confusing enemies.
  • Gell's Gravitas was added in 0.16.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Gell%27s_Gravitas&oldid=81003"
